summary: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.
cast: Hugh Jackman|Kate Winslet|Ian McKellen|Jean Reno|Bill Nighy|Andy Serkis|Shane Richie|Kathy Burke|David Suchet|Miriam Margolyes|Rachel Rawlinson|Susan Duerden|Miles Richardson|John Motson|Douglas Weston|Roger Blake|Christopher Fairbank|Paul Shardlow|Conrad Vernon|Jonathan Kydd|Newell Alexander|Susan Fitzer|Joshua Silk|Meredith Wells|Ashleigh-Louis Elliot|Ashleigh Ludwig|Christopher Knights|Emma Tate|Tom McGrath|Sam Fell|David Bowers
title: Ratónpolis
